bibl.title: Crop Rotation and Rent Payment in Oxyrhynchite Land Leases: Social and Economic Interpretations.
bibl.note: The Oxyrhynchite leases will be discussed and documented more fully in a forthcoming book on landholding in the Oxyrhynchite nome.

bibl.title: Proceedings of the 20th International Congress of Papyrologists

bibl.seg: ROWLANDSON Jane, Crop Rotation and Rent Payment in Oxyrhynchite Land Leases: Social and Economic Interpretations.
Proceedings of the 20th International Congress of Papyrologists (Copenhagen, 1994) pp. 495-499.
The Oxyrhynchite leases will be discussed and documented more fully in a forthcoming book on landholding in the Oxyrhynchite nome.
